name: Eight Talons
description: At ETC, we are dedicated to helping job seekers find their dream careers while supporting businesses in finding top talent. Our team of experienced recruiters and career coaches work with individuals and companies of all sizes and industries to provide customized employment solutions. Browse our service offerings and job listings or contact us today to learn more about how we can assist you in achieving your employment goals. Formerly known as Qood Talent and incorporated in 2021, Eight Talons Consulting (ETC) is a young company that started out with the vision to becoming a recognised and trusted recruitment brand through putting “service” and “creditability” at the core of our values. ETC provides an integrated approach to delivering bespoke talent solutions and talent acquisition services across industries and organisation sizes, from MNCs, SMEs to new Startups in Singapore.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Embrace. Empower. Employ
ShortDescription: Eight Talons Consulting (ETC) is a young company that started out with the vision to become a recognised and trusted recruitment brand by putting “service” and “creditability” at the core of our values.
enhanced_description: Eight Talons Consulting (ETC), formerly Qood Talent, is a Singapore-based recruitment firm established in 2021. Dedicated to assisting both job seekers in finding career opportunities and businesses in securing top talent, ETC provides bespoke talent solutions and talent acquisition services. Their team comprises experienced recruiters and career coaches who offer customized employment solutions across various industries and organization sizes, ranging from multinational corporations (MNCs) and small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to new startups. ETC specializes in permanent placement services, with a strong focus on the Information & Digital Technology and Supply Chain, Logistics & Procurement sectors. The company prides itself on delivering integrated solutions with service and credibility at its core, aiming to help businesses hire top talent faster and more efficiently while boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
competitive_advantages: Specialization in Information & Digital Technology and Supply Chain, Logistics & Procurement sectors
roi_benefits: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
scalability_features: Services offered to individuals and companies of all sizes
Supports clients from SMEs to MNCs and new Startups
